summary: Completed comprehensive testing of XON Architect application including backend APIs, frontend authentication, dashboard functionality, and core CRUD operations. All critical features are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Registration role selection dropdown has selector issues - difficult to select specific roles programmatically
Modal overlay sometimes blocks navigation clicks, requiring force clicks

integration_issues.issue: 422 error when submitting transaction form - validation issue

issues: Console warnings about missing Description for DialogContent components

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements needed: 1) Fix role selection dropdown for better accessibility, 2) Resolve modal overlay click blocking issues, 3) Fix transaction form validation (422 error), 4) Add aria-describedby for dialog components to remove console warnings
